Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory196.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Explosions! All members, be on the alert!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Scan for the source!', 3: '7'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I've located where the detonation signal came from!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We can make it in time if we surround them now!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory195.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With the residue heat from the faraway explosions still palpable in the air, Vera stands in front of the entrance to the aquarium corridor.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'We cool being this up front about it?'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Them Gray Ravens might take this the wrong way, yeah?'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You make it sound like a bad thing. I'll get more toys this way, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Successfully blocked two possible routes. Target should be contained for thirty minutes.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's more than enough. Let's begin.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh, wait, situation update.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'The birds are flying faster than we thought they could.'}
{3: 'The footsteps of you and your companions announce your arrival. You and the others surround Vera from two ends.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why are you here?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hah. What does that have to do with you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If you're here... Then that means Commander Nikola is...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Yeah? What's it got to do with you, then, Kurono deserter?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Don't get me wrong, there are times when I envy you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'At least your little birdcage seems to be giving you some inner peace.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey! Vera! I knew it, you caught their attention on purpose!'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Stop being a muck-head and get me outta this.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "A grenade explodes by Lee's feet, sending up light and smoke."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I ain't reminding y'all on the public channel next time, yeah?"}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "And it won't be these smokers next time round!"}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{3: 'After you finally get rid of the smoke, Vera is already nowhere to be found.'}
{3: 'The nearby Corrupted seem to be drawn by the explosion and light, and slowly surround you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Tsk, the same as before. Just makes a mess and never cleans up!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory192.png'}
{3: 'Twenty minutes later...'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Oi, you're feelin' kinda different, girl."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: '...Is it just me, or are you being extra annoying today?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I mean... ya ain't thinking they might be a chance for you to change... or sumthin'?"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '21, wring his neck.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "On second thoughts, don't wring it off entirelyâ€”guy's still useful.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey! Was just kidding, mam! Hey, you devil! Don't come closer!"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Alright, enough of this nonsense. Blow up all the scheduled sites, and move over to the next target location.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Alright! Blast sites two to sixteen! A full course of dee-na-mee-tay, coming right up!'}
